text.section:
Security under this subtitle:
if required by the State or a unit of the State government, shall be payable to "the State of Maryland"; or
if required by any other public body, shall be payable to that public body.

The form of payment security or performance security shall be approved:
for the State or a unit of the State government, by the Attorney General; and
for any other public body, by its attorney.

The contractor shall file the security or evidence of a trust account established as security:
if payable to the State under this section, in the Office of the Comptroller; or
if payable to any other public body, in the appropriate office of that public body.
